title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.6 - Conflict of interest
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.6 - Conflict of interest

State Regulations
A trustee with a past or present affiliation with an
applicant (including employee, officer, director, trustee, counsel or business
relationship) for distribution of funds shall declare such affiliation to the
trustees, and that trustees shall not participate in a vote on any matter
relating directly to such applicant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7000.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
